message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to offer it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I've done some research, and I think that's a fair price for this product.

I understand your concerns about the price, Bob, but I think the product is worth a bit more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $90. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $80. I'm willing to go up to $85, but that's as high as I'm comfortable going. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're getting close to your maximum, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $92. It's a good compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $92. I'm willing to meet you at $87. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand you're making a final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $89. It's a good compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.
I understand you're trying to make a final concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $89. I'm willing to pay $87, and that's my final offer. I'm not willing to go any higher.
